description: This file defines an interface named Tamperable that describes a tamperable cluster in a device, with methods to query and set the tamper switch state.
external_files: License and SPDX license files (not directly referenced but present in header comments)

classes.name: Tamperable
classes.description: Interface that describes a tamperable cluster (e.g., device case opened)

methods.name: isTampered
methods.description: Query tamper switch state; returns true when the device tamper switch is in the 'unsafe' position

methods.name: setTampered
methods.description: Set tamper switch state; takes a boolean indicating whether the device is tampered
